TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別代表與相關聯的簽署人物件，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的簽章類別可以透過訊息內容或簽章。The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. 後者這類型的簽章指*副署*。The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 的支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是簽章可以被簽署，形成副署，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 這個類別沒有公用建構函式因此，它無法被公開具現化。This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. 它是唯讀狀態類別從存取屬性。It is a read-only class accessible from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

summary.span: 屬性會擷取與簽署人資訊關聯的簽署憑證。

span.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.
An object that represents the signing certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果簽章憑證就不會包含在簽入時間使用屬性，則該憑證將不會傳回。If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the property, then the certificate will not be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckHash() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會驗證 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊的資料完整性。

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: 是特定安全性基礎結構應用程式中會使用的特定方法，在這種應用程式中，主體會在設定 物件時使用 列舉的 **HashOnly** 成員。

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the **HashOnly** member of the enumeration when setting up a object.

summary.span: 因為這個方法未涉及驗證數位簽章，則不會驗證簽署人資訊。

span.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: 如需一般用途的完整性和真實性的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊和副署的檢查，使用或方法。

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不提供驗證的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊。This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

exception.span: 無法完成密碼編譯作業。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

summary.span: 驗證訊息的數位簽章。

span.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: Bool 值，指定是否要驗證數位簽章。

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.
If is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: 如果是、 驗證數位簽章、 憑證鏈結進行驗證，和會驗證憑證的目的。

span.span: If is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰的使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性，則憑證的目的可視為有效。

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法會驗證訊息的數位簽章，並選擇性地驗證憑證。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更複雜的驗證，呼叫端可以指定只有簽章驗證，然後使用物件，以執行自訂驗證。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

exception.span: Null 參考已傳遞至不接受其為有效的引數的方法。

span.span: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.

exception.span: 無法完成密碼編譯作業。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

exception.span: 方法呼叫對於物件的目前狀態無效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CheckSignature (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection extraStore, bool verifySignatureOnly);
.method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection extraStore, bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed
Public Sub CheckSignature (extraStore As X509Certificate2Collection, verifySignatureOnly As Boolean)

param.name: extraStore
param.span: 可用來驗證鏈結的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to validate the chain.

param.span: 如果沒有任何額外的憑證來驗證鏈結，請使用而不是。

span.span: If no additional certificates are to be used to validate the chain, use instead of .

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: Bool 值，指定是否要驗證數位簽章。

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.
If is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: 如果是、 驗證數位簽章、 憑證鏈結進行驗證，和會驗證憑證的目的。

span.span: If is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰的使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性，則憑證的目的可視為有效。

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法會驗證訊息的數位簽章的方式是使用指定的憑證集合，並選擇性地驗證憑證。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更複雜的驗證，呼叫端可以指定只有簽章驗證，然後使用物件，以執行自訂驗證。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

summary.span: 建立副署簽章，並將簽章加入至 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息。

span.span: Creates a countersignature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeCounterSignature() cil managed

summary.span: 方法提示使用者選取簽署憑證、 建立副署，並加入至 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的簽章。

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 限制副屬為一個層級。

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 的支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是簽章可以被簽署，形成副署，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 這個方法會顯示您可以在其中選擇此訊息的簽署人的使用者介面。This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. 這需要確認目前的處理序正在執行*使用者互動模式*，亦即，屬性設定為`true`。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 處理程序是通常於使用者互動模式中，除非它是服務處理程序或 Web 應用程式內執行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 簽署憑證的憑證符合下列條件將會顯示在清單中：Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - 憑證中有相關聯的私密金鑰。The certificate has an associated private key. - 憑證是在其有效期間內。The certificate is within its validity period. - 憑證中有沒有金鑰使用方式或支援數位簽章或不可否認性的金鑰使用方式。The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. 簽署者憑證從選擇 My 存放區。Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能顯示使用者介面：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

summary.span: 限制副屬為一個層級。

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 的支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是簽章可以被簽署，形成副署，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

summary.span: 屬性會擷取與簽署人資訊關聯的副簽署人組。

span.span: The property retrieves the set of counter signers associated with the signer information.

value.span: A集合，表示副簽署人資訊。

span.span: A collection that represents the counter signers for the signer information.

value.span: 如果沒有副簽署人，屬性會是空的集合。

span.span: If there are no counter signers, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作 CMS/PKCS #7 的支援只有一個層級的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是簽章可以被簽署，形成副署，但無法再次簽署該副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.

value.span: 物件，表示配合簽章的雜湊演算法。

public: property System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ SignatureAlgorithm { System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 物件使用的簽章演算法識別碼。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the signature algorithm used by the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件使用的簽章演算法識別碼。

span.span: The identifier for the signature algorithm used by the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 屬性會擷取的帶正負號的屬性與簽署人資訊關聯的集合。

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

summary.span: 帶正負號的屬性會與訊息內容的其餘部分進行簽署。

span.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

value.span: A表示帶正負號的屬性集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the signed attributes.

value.span: 如果不有任何帶正負號的屬性，屬性會是空的集合。

span.span: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帶正負號的屬性，可能會包含在範例藉由擷取集合屬性是簽署時間屬性。An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. 帶正負號的屬性已簽署的其餘部分以及訊息內容。Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content. 這表示已成功驗證的簽章的合作對象可以有信心，這些屬性的內容已驗證，並沒有變更。This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered. A物件和物件會自動產生並放置在屬性時對應簽署者的屬性不是空白。A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property whenever the property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerIdentifier As SubjectIdentifier

summary.span: 屬性會擷取與簽署人資訊關聯的簽署人的憑證識別碼。

span.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

value.span: A可唯一識別與簽署人資訊關聯的憑證物件。

span.span: A object that uniquely identifies the certificate associated with the signer information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnsignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 屬性會擷取相關聯的不帶正負號屬性集合內容。

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

summary.span: 不帶正負號的屬性可以進行修改，而不使簽章失效。

span.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

value.span: A集合，表示不帶正負號的屬性。

span.span: A collection that represents the unsigned attributes.

value.span: 如果不有任何不帶正負號的屬性，屬性會是空的集合。

span.span: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不帶正負號的屬性以及剩餘的未簽署訊息內容。Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the message content. 即使合作對象已順利驗證簽章，則不帶正負號的屬性可能已遭修改，並且不應視為真確性或完整性。Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity. 不帶正負號的屬性，可能會包含在範例集合擷取屬性是副署簽章。An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 屬性會擷取簽署人資訊版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

value.span: Int 值，指定簽署人資訊版本。

span.span: An int value that specifies the signer information version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的較新的超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
